featured.text: If we 30 surrounded by an unending abundance of diamonds, we probably wouldn’t value them very much.
In the 1920s a mechanical potato peeler was invented and soon there were potato chips in abundance.

definition.zh_def: 大量，豐富，充足的狀態或數量。
definition.en_def: A large quantity of something; a plentiful supply.
definition.example: The garden was filled with an abundance of colorful flowers.
